channel.description: Policies Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 469 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: What are policies: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/policies/ Page type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.

item.title: Global session and authentication policies
item.description: Global session and authentication policies Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 658 Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: Summary overview of the different types of policy that combine to form an authentication ruleset Global session policy Authentication policy Enrollment policy Links to original docs: First section in Configure a global session policy and authentication policies: https://developer.
